story_parts.text:
The lion was always a bit different than the other lions in the pride. He was always asking questions and observing his surroundings. It was clear he was intelligent beyond the average lion. One day, a group of men in suits came to the pride and took the lion away. The other lions didn't know where he went, but they knew he was special.

The lion was taken to a secret government facility where he was trained to be a spy. He was taught how to use

next_options.0: The lion is successful in his new role and helps the government solve many crimes
next_options.1: The lion is not cut out for the job and is eventually released back into the wild

next_options.0: The woman decides to confront her husband about his affair
next_options.1: The woman decides to confront the other woman her husband is seeing

quiz_parts.question: What does the author say about the relationship between the two friends?

options.1: The friends were close, but had a falling out
options.2: The friends were close, but drifted apart
